website_summaries.verdict: A reliable analog-digital model with many features.
pros: An extra-large, extra-durable watch with G-Shock's usual bevy of features, like its daylight saving mode, stopwatch, four alarms, and auto-calendar
The white hands are very visible, and the rugged case will hold up
cons: Dim LED backlight makes the digital screen hard to read in the dark

customer_reviews.title: Great Watch, Great Functionally
customer_reviews.text: This is a great watch at a great price. It has an extensive amount of capabilities. The only downer is that the light doesn't shine on the digital portion of the watch. However, all you need is to know how to read an analog watch and you'd be fine. That fact takes away extremely little of the watches pure awesomeness.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Menconi

customer_reviews.title: it's a sweet looking watch and the analog display is accurate
customer_reviews.text: First let me say I am 100% dedicated to the g-shock line of watches. They're rugged, stylish and incredibly reliable. That said, there two things that are issues for me with this watch: visibility and the background "light". Specifically, I can't read the digital display to save my life. I've tried and just given up. As for the orange display "light" - I say "light" because it's really not a light in the sense that it shows anything, just faintly shows the digital display in the dark. Long story short, it's a sweet looking watch and the analog display is accurate, but don't buy this thing if you don't have night vision... .Go with one of the other models instead.
customer_reviews.author: Chet 523

customer_reviews.title: Great for Law Enforcement
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a gift for a fellow police officer who works night... Let me say this, it has been a trooper through some of the things it's been submitted to already. The "too dim" issue that some people speak of is actually a bonus for him. You can't have a watch that's going to light up and entire room if you bump into a wall after clearing a building- that'd be a HUGE issue. I have a Casio watch myself and have been contemplating transitioning to this one due to how effective it has been.
customer_reviews.author: R

customer_reviews.title: Wonderfull garbage for the second time!!!!
customer_reviews.text: That is second g-shock who buy from amazon i am very disapointed because is geting water inside the glass same like the first one! I cant believe this, that most popular brand geting water inside with 200 under water feet resistent!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Look no further!
customer_reviews.text: Military precision and quality. I am an ex serviceman and wish I had a watch like this while I was deployed. Time sets automatically to different time zones. Has a rugged and stealthy look. I receive compliments all the time. Truly high quality. Honestly, I would be ok paying double for this watch. You can't find a more high quality watch for the price. I wouldn't recommend this watch if your wrists are on the thin side. Its a large size watch but extremely light weight.
customer_reviews.author: E. Mer

customer_reviews.title: Beware of counterfeits
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with this watch. The tactical style is perfect for my work environment, the price is great, and it has just about every feature you could want in a timepiece. Unfortunately, there are people selling cheaply made counterfeits, even on prime, and it took me two tries to get the real deal. At least Amazon was good enough to give me a full refund. Make sure your watch feels high quality and matches the photo exactly, so you don’t get taken advantage of.
customer_reviews.author: Kurt

customer_reviews.title: Nice watch
customer_reviews.text: I like this G Shock watch. Its comfortable and easy to adjust. The print in the booklet that came with the watch is extra small. I could not see it. I went to YouTube and found several very good short videos that showed me how to do everything I needed. The light is bright. The face of the watch is big. I have a big wrist and the band fit good. I do recommend this watch to anyone looking for a nice big watch.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The best military style watch with the most features I’ve seen for the price. 100% happy
customer_reviews.text: Amazing watch that looks rugged and impressive, is incredibly high Tec setting its own time and al the crazy features and can do all kinds of stuff I’m still figuring out. And for all of the people commenting that it’s too dark of a watch, I don’t know if you realize that this one is specific for military use and face and the light are specifically darker and dim yellow light so people can’t see you from a far. So it does exactly what it is supposed to do perfectly, beautifully and is cheap somehow!
customer_reviews.author: Wesley Catlin

customer_reviews.title: Love this watch!
customer_reviews.text: I love this watch! The style of look and rugged build was exactly what I was looking for in an everyday wear wrist watch. It’s built tough enough to wear at work and looks absolutely great on my wrist with my daily casual wardrobe. In fact I t’s the perfect compliment to my outfits. I feel it has a really masculine design that’s such a good fit for me. I cannot comment on its water resistance because I haven’t had to test it yet. It came in all the original authentic packaging that provided an exciting unpacking experience. Nothing about this watch seems like a fake which unfortunately is a really big problem on Amazon. I highly recommend this watch.
customer_reviews.author: Real Honest Reviewers

customer_reviews.title: Always love a good G-Shock! This one is my favorite!
customer_reviews.text: Simply the best! I’ve owned this exact reference G-Shock for over ten years. It’s been in the ocean, the lake, the pool, and (against better judgement) even the hot tub. Never had an issue with it and have absolutely loved it as an every day “beater watch”. I should state that the watch I’ve had for over ten years is still working perfectly; however, I did damage one of the pushers just recently and the watch is no longer water resistant. No worries though...I just purchased another and it arrived today! I can’t wait to get a good 10 plus years out of this one as well!
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Stealth Watch for Non-Wanna-Be-SEALS/Survivalists...
customer_reviews.text: Love this watch for being what it was designed for...sheer stealth, utter reliability, simple function and unquestioned durability...period. People who don't understand what this watch was created for -- whine about its lack of this and that irrelevancy. Rubbish. Methinks too many urban, hipster, wanna-be-SEALS/survivalists crybabies out there. LOL. If you really know what you want, this will be a most excellent timepiece and you won't regret procuring one for a very modest price...a great investment for a lifetime!
customer_reviews.author: EHL

customer_reviews.title: So dark and hard to read, might as well be analog only
customer_reviews.text: Extremely "cool" looking. As far as being usable, not so much. If you are in anything other than direct sunlight, the entire face and all digital display windows are entirely unusable. Whether you're inside during the day or at night, the light, as many have said, only lights up the analog hands and does nothing for the digital display windows. This thing is way, way darker in person than in the pictures which were obviously taken with good lighting. I really, really wanted to like this watch as the 'tacticool' look is there (with perfect lighting), but after wearing it for a day or two I had to admit it was almost entirely non-functional and had to send it back.
customer_reviews.author: R Cave

customer_reviews.title: False advertising!
customer_reviews.text: Hi, the information that was provided for this product about the case diameter is false. It says that it has a 37mm diameter but that is not true. I bought this for my son who is turning 14 today. The watch is twice the size of my wrist. If you are the watch for its size then no its to big. This is my Casio G shock watch and this is the watch I got. It’s disappointing to have to give him this now even after I emailed the seller before purchasing it and he said “yes, it is 37mm”. Compared to my G shock it’s about 10-12mm larger.
customer_reviews.author: Apple

customer_reviews.title: Useless stopwatch, overall difficult to see
customer_reviews.text: The question you have to ask yourself before buying this is "do I actually want to use this watch for a stopwatch?" If you answer yes to this, do not buy this watch. Any time the minute or hour hands are between 7 and 9 on the dial, you will not be able to see the stopwatch. This is in lighted conditions. If you use the stopwatch ever at night, you will not be able to see anything. Pros: looks cool Cons: useless otherwise
customer_reviews.author: Derrick J.

customer_reviews.title: is not like the picture. It's so dark you can't see the numbers and letters.
customer_reviews.text: The watch is not like the picture. It's so dark you can't see the numbers and letters. Even with the light on you can't see the numbers well. I'm so disappointed it was my husband christmas gift. He need that watch for his job.
customer_reviews.author: hector jimenez

customer_reviews.title: Got an electrical engineering degree?
customer_reviews.text: You'll need one just to reset the time. The numerous steps you have to go through to go from Daylight Savings and back again is idiotic. If they tried to make the process less intuitive, they couldn't. This piece of junk sits in a drawer along with other dumb purchases. Also, the buttons are so recessed, it is difficult to activate any of the functions. Nothing can be all things at once. Just be a watch. That's enough.
customer_reviews.author: Laurence Singerman

customer_reviews.title: Easy to read time, but analog hands block view of other functions
customer_reviews.text: This is an accurate timepiece with easy to read analog hands. However, if you need it for date, stopwatch or other functions, the analog-digital combo doesn’t work out. The date is blocked at some points, the stopwatch part is at others. It’s hard to read the negative display in some lighting. The LED light is almost pointless, although you can kind’ve see the watch hands but not the daigital displays at all. Also found it a little too large on my 8.25” wrist as well. Luckily amazon has an easy return process.
customer_reviews.author: Nick Zak

customer_reviews.title: Too complicated
customer_reviews.text: This was my main watch for well over a year. I continued to wear it because it looked nice. It was rather difficult to use and it was impossible to tell the time at night. Even during the day if you were trying to see the date it would be on another setting and when you try to cycle through to find the date it would start cycling through time zones or all sorts of weird things. I’m sure you could get this watch down if you actually studied it, but even with a year of casual use I found it too complicated and difficult to read, and only wore it for the looks.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very good gshock
customer_reviews.text: Very nice watch. I personally like the blacked out design. The numbers on the LCD is difficult to see in the dark, but no problem to see in daylight. The analog arms reflect light fairly well to be able to see in low light conditions. The illumination is mostly for the analog arms.... what else would you want to see in the dark? The seconds or date?... other than that it's very rugged and water resistant. The watch size does not overpower your wrists in my opinion if you have small wrists...10/10
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy J.

customer_reviews.title: I love the analogue and seems tough enough for outdoor and ...
customer_reviews.text: It's Ok. I love the analogue and seems tough enough for outdoor and field training work I do. And decent price. But... Alarm is not loud enough to wake me up. Kinda complicated to set things like timer and alarm quickly. Worst of all, the led light does not illuminate the digital displays, so unless you have a light handy (like a headlamp or a small red light you can hold in your mouth) other than being able to tell the time it is pretty much worthless in the dark. Im not going to return it but will look for something else in the future (Simpler with better lighting and louder alarm.)
customer_reviews.author: Dutch

customer_reviews.title: Hard to Read
customer_reviews.text: Sure, the watch is functional but it's practically impossible to read the time because the numbers are the same color as the watch, just digitized. You have to hold it at just the right angle to read the time correctly. And YES, it does have a built in light but it is also useless. It would be as handy as shining an almost-dead flashlight on your already difficult to read watch. Maybe I'm picky, but the largest feature of a watch is THE TIME so I kind of expect to be able to read it.
customer_reviews.author: Cassandra Hudson

customer_reviews.title: Classic GShock with a caveat.
customer_reviews.text: Great weekend/camping watch. Doesn’t feel as heavy as I expected but it is a lot larger than I anticipated. Build quality is great. Band feels tough and the watch case is definitely up to most tests. All things considered, very happy. My only complaint is the illumination is.... bad. I can’t think of needing many of the dial features outside of just time (which illuminates fine) but if you desperately need a timer in the dark, maybe find a better watch for that function.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Riches

customer_reviews.title: Can’t read digital functions
customer_reviews.text: Bought this watch. Amazon picture shows white digits on black face. It’s not. It’s really black/dark grey digits on black face and next to impossible to read. You can’t read your time zone, day, alarm, or timers unless you have the right angle and light. What you have is an analog watch with white hands and dark digits on black face.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce Grant

customer_reviews.title: Great Looking - But.......
customer_reviews.text: The on-line photos looked great and in person the appearance is very nice. The real issue with this watch in that it is very difficult to read, which makes it difficult to set up. The built in light is nearly useless because it is dim and does not adequately light the small windows you have to see to set it. So would I recommend it? NO. If you are looking for something functional, buy a watch with a bigger face and sharper background features. I returned this and am currently looking at others.
customer_reviews.author: Whaledriver

customer_reviews.title: G-Shock Men's Watch
customer_reviews.text: I like it and my only reason for less than 5 star rating(s) is due to the settings. Once set it's a good watch. But you have to slog through multiple steps just to change things. I felt it was needlessly complicated just to set up. Provided instruction sheet was OK but I needed to go to the CASIO website for more and better instructions to finally get it all right. A good watch for price but complicated....
customer_reviews.author: Robert Hickey

customer_reviews.title: It’s a g-shock, so you’re going to get a great quality watch.
customer_reviews.text: I’m a g-shock guy, I’ve been one since the 80’s. You can’t find a better watch for the money in my opinion. On this model is hard to see the digital readout and the light, although cool, doesn’t help much in reading the display. Otherwise it’s a fine watch and I’m sure it will get a lot of use once I quit my job and stop using my old g-shock. It’s not the best g-shock I’ve ever had, but it’s a fine watch. I buy g-shocks for durability and with this you get a rugged looking watch. Not a watch you wear to a fancy place, but I’m not that kind of guy.
customer_reviews.author: notreadyforprimetime

customer_reviews.title: This watch is pretty impressive!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband for our anniversary and he loves it. I was a little worried when it said "military" in the description because my husband is a veteran and when companies label their products with that it feels like they're just trying to market their product on the backs of the military. I was EXTREMELY happy when he inspected it and loved it. G-shock watches have a great reputation for longevity and great performance.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonPrimeMember

customer_reviews.title: Documents and instructions for this watch are a nightmare!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great watch, but the instruction manual for the watch is beyond awful! I went to their web site and downloaded additional information. Still, I was unable to set it, then make it work. Finally, I tossed the watch and documents in a zip lock bag and put it in a drawer..... never to be seen again! I am fairly proficient with technology, but this documentation had giant gaps in the information. It was not worth the frustration to deal with it.
customer_reviews.author: Flash G

customer_reviews.title: He kept talking about all the things it does and how cool it is
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my boyfriend. He is a watch collector. I have bought him watches, hybrid watches and other watches and when he asked for this inexpensive watch I was a little puzzled. When the package arrived and I told him it was his birthday present and he could open it early if he wanted, he ripped it open and I have honestly never seen him be so excited about a watch. He kept talking about all the things it does and how cool it is. I guess this watch is a winner. Wish I would have known this sooner. Could have saved a ton of money lol.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah K Jenkins

customer_reviews.title: Great for military
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my son who is a marine. He loved it and appreciated the all black as apposed to black/blue one I purchased for my other son who just graduated from officer candidate school. The black face seemed easier for me to read than the black with blue. I believe they read in the manual that it is only water proof as deep as a human can dive with no gear-not a diving watch.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great watch if...
customer_reviews.text: This watch is perfect for my intended use which is for sporting activities and hiking. I do not need to see the digital displays (date etc...) when doing these activities, all I really need is the time which can be easily seen in any lighting. If you intend to wear this as a daily watch where seeing the date is important, the watch is as reviewed - difficult to see in some lighting situations.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Cool looking military style watch, but....
customer_reviews.text: Cool looking military style watch, but as others have stated it is very hard to read anything other than the analog hands in average lighting conditions and the light function is next to worthless. At night you will need a flashlight shinning directly on the watch to read all but the analog hands. The watch is a bit complicated to use in stop watch and other functions, and again hard to read. The good: it is a very tuff, good looking water resistant watch and it is cheap...so I plan on keeping it, but for someone who needs a true military spec watch that is easy to read in the dark you should keep searching.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great watch perfect size not so big that it's overbearing ...
customer_reviews.text: Great watch perfect size not so big that it's overbearing yet large enough that it's easy to see and look substantial. Typical Casio quality just what you would expect from a G-Shock. This is the best G-Shock I have owned and I have had several of them over the years they hold up do great levels of abuse and the only reason I've ever had to replace one is because I did something with it that I should not have done. I cannot recommend this watch any higher it will do everything that you needed to do for sporting activities and hold up to anything you can put it up to.
customer_reviews.author: Drwarr

customer_reviews.title: Cool watch with unusable features
customer_reviews.text: I want to love this watch. I love the size and "murdered out" aesthetic, but it's not useful. It is basically only good for telling time. If you try to use the timer, or check the date or do any of the other features that this offers, you have to be standing in direct bright light to see anything. The illumination is a small orange light that will only allow you to see the hands of the watch. If you need to do anything with this in low light, find something with more of a "glow" function. I still wear it everyday, but I've resigned myself to only using it to tell time.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Jensen

customer_reviews.title: Good watch with rich features
customer_reviews.text: This watch has a nice large display and looks comfortable with multiple display items. Bough it for my son and he likes most of the features, especially the automatic clock needle setting feature and high resolution stop watch feature. The nice thing is the clock needle are in white color against dark background which makes clock reading easier.
customer_reviews.author: Gordon

customer_reviews.title: Stock Photo Misrepresents Features
customer_reviews.text: Digital not accurately represented in the stock photo. If the digital readings are important, know that they are much darker in hand; the alarm and depth circle indicators are identically black. The digits can be read and the LED sufficiently illuminates the face, but if one requires ease of reading, this might affect one’s decision. See the video posted in the review section for an accurate view.
customer_reviews.author: Stowell

customer_reviews.title: Packed with features, but too hard to read, to use them.
customer_reviews.text: The style of this watch is amazing. This is my first G-Shock watch, and I am impressed with the available features on this 'entry level' price point. However, it is next to impossible to read the LCD displays. The light function does not change that. Having the LCD display 'reversed' is a bad move. I will be replacing it with a different model soon.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Graunke

customer_reviews.title: Great watch. Can’t beat the cost to value.
customer_reviews.text: Great watch. Would buy another if amazon would honor their guarantee. Received mine 3 days late past the 2 day prime guarantee delivery date. I needed this for work and missed a day because of it. But that’s not the watches fault. Other than that great watch.
customer_reviews.author: Curt_32

customer_reviews.title: Ease of use
customer_reviews.text: The most confusing watch i ever bought. Got these to use while riding my MC. You need to be a rocket science major to set the correct times and sync to your State. Couldn't get it right even with instructions. Threw these in the garbage, Won.t ever buy Casio again.
customer_reviews.author: Raven

customer_reviews.title: Damaged (bad lot?)
customer_reviews.text: Watch didn’t keep time. I reset it per directions but could not keep up with time. After researching possible issues it could have been trauma to the watch or battery. Either way it should not have an issue out of the box which was damaged. I think Jim Carrey delivered it (pet detective reference). I ordered another one and saw box was damaged again and decided not to even deal with it so I returned that one as well
customer_reviews.author: david m rudy jr

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, Fashionable.
customer_reviews.text: I got this after I got some scratches on my Apple Watch, wanted something I could use for work that wouldn’t get damaged and had a nice look to it. I got compliments on it at work and was asked where I got it from. I use this more than my Apple Watch now, and only wear the Apple Watch on special occasions. This watch is manly and it has a lot of character. Plus it’s black so it goes well with every outfit.
customer_reviews.author: Diego Díaz Vco

customer_reviews.title: OLD WATCH.
customer_reviews.text: Well After 3 months of having this watch it just died. You could never really see the numbers inside the watch (Date,city,codes) as it appears on amazon. This was a huge disappointment, I have always had a G-Shock and never had a problem with them or the battery life. Don't waste your time on this watch, you will be just as frustrated as I am. I am surprise at Amazon for selling these old watches and not putting new batteries in them.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Mendez

customer_reviews.title: I can see the watch hands, but the rest f the watch, even with the light are too dark to read.
customer_reviews.text: I can see the watch hands, but the rest of the watch, even with the light are too dark to read. The owners manual/ instructions are difficult to read and understand and it make in unlikely I would ever have the opportunity to use many of the features. I have had numerous Casio military watches over the years and this is not as good as the previous ones. I will be attempting to return it for another simpler model.
customer_reviews.author: Donald O. Lincoln Jr.

customer_reviews.title: I don't like this watch at all
customer_reviews.text: I don't like this watch at all. You can't read anything on it except the dial hands. The black background completely drowns out and almost hides the digital displays. I never should have bought the watch. 90.00 down the tubes!
customer_reviews.author: j.keith

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Good
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good. Seems sturdy. It's large, but in my opinion, not too large for a slim wrist. If you're looking for a watch with a dark face and dark digital read-out, this is it. The only down side is that it's difficult to read the digital areas if you're not in a well lit environment and/or holding it at the right angle to catch the light. Also, it's not back-lit, so when you press the button for the light, it doesn't help with the digital areas.
customer_reviews.author: Jim W.

customer_reviews.title: This is one tough, well made watch!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son for an early birthday present when he was going into the Army. He went through basic training, AIT and is at his FDS and the watch looks practically brand new. He has gone through mud, crawled through the woods and been in water and a million other situations and the watch is still shiny on the face of it and has virtually no wear. He rarely takes it off and has worn it for almost 9 months straight.
customer_reviews.author: Ann L.

customer_reviews.title: Great watch for those who work in the night time/early morning hours
customer_reviews.text: I'm an LEO who works night watch, so being able to see the time at night is important for my job. The GA 1A1 is a great watch to have for this very purpose. Casio has made a stylish watch to wear, but is still tactical for night use. The watch is very resistant to shock and is waterproof, which is a plus My only compliant is that the light could be brighter, as it isn't the brightest sometimes when it is completely dark. Overall, it's a good watch, but still could use some improvements.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Wolak

customer_reviews.title: Great but.,..
customer_reviews.text: Love this watch...super cool looking and quality built. Two issues I don't like though: 1. I wish it was back-lit. It's really hard to see the digital displays. 2. Alarm volume is way too low. It's useless if you depend on it to wake you up. Timex from experience tends to be louder.
customer_reviews.author: AM

customer_reviews.title: Meh. Its a watch.
customer_reviews.text: I mean it's a watch right so it tells me the time it works fine I'm an EMT so it helps me do my job. It's part of my uniform I do wish the light was brighter the backlight I wish you was brighter so you can actually use the seconds on the watch to take someone's pulse in the night or a dark room.
customer_reviews.author: Nishal Harrindranauth

customer_reviews.title: Lasted 4 yrs
customer_reviews.text: Well it was a good watch. None of the time zones work anymore so I have to take it apart and change it be hand when I travel or during daylight savings time. The watch band just broke as well and I had to glue it. I've owned Bulova, Timex and G-Shock watches my whole life and if you want the most rugged watch there is, but a g shock. There bulky and ugly, just like a Glock and just as reliable.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas

customer_reviews.title: Not the ideal watch for a medic or first responder.
customer_reviews.text: The watch itself is huge, black and stealthy. A bit too stealthy for my liking. The screen is hard to read as the color is to obscure on the led display . The Alarm speaker is also very weak to an older model G-Shock I own. I believe Casio dropped the ball on this model, but I'm keeping it for my collection. If you're a first responder don't buy this for work get a G-shock with a secondhand as you will be struggling taking vitals on a Pt in low light. 4-stars is my rating because of the lack of a readable display in low light even using the led amber light display.
customer_reviews.author: RocB

customer_reviews.title: Hard to read LCD
customer_reviews.text: You can barely see the LCD, It is nowhere as bright as the product photos will have you believe . If there is a lot of direct light, you can see it fine . The hands are quite easy to read, but the face of the watch has the same lighting issues as the LCD. Other than that, it's a cool looking watch , just not good for telling the time. Pretty rugged though. Added some photos in differing lighting so you can see what i mean
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great watch
customer_reviews.text: Love this watch. Durable, functional and good looking. If you are looking for a light that illuminates the face, this watch isn’t for you. You can see the hands, but not the digital face. That being said, this a great watch and I would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Big t

customer_reviews.title: I’m a little disappointed
customer_reviews.text: The watch tells time ok. I’m just disappointed with the appearance. It’s not as bulky as I expected. It just doesn’t look like a mans watch like I expected the G-Shock watch to be. As long as it tells time is my main concern.
customer_reviews.author: E. Fox

customer_reviews.title: 1 year and going...
customer_reviews.text: I've had this watch for a bit over a year now. Not a single issue, just as I am used to from a G-Shock. Easy to read and work with and highly durable. Would absolutely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Francis W.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Watch!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love it! Sure the analog doesn’t light up and can be difficult to see in certain light but you can still tell the time if you know how to read a clock lol It’s an awesome watch and I’m perfectly content and happy with it!
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Short Term Review
customer_reviews.text: Love it so far. Don't know completely how to use all the features but for telling the time and surviving it's great. I build houses so this gets out through a lot of abuse and it hasn't had an issue yet. I don't believe the "raise to illuminate feature" work on mine but I've only used that feature twice and it's not terribly hard to push the button for it.
customer_reviews.author: DT

customer_reviews.title: Great Watch for the Price- Highly Recommend
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised with this watch. It looks nice on the wrist, is easy to use, and seems durable. I ride horses with it on the daily and it shows no signs of wear. I am a woman with an average sized wrist and it fits me well, doesn’t look enormous on my wrist, and the band is a nice length. I would definitely buy this watch again should something happen to the one I have now.
customer_reviews.author: Rainey Gibbs

customer_reviews.title: A tough read....
customer_reviews.text: Nice product, but the "all black" is tricky to see in all but perfect lighting conditions. Setting the watch up wasn't bad but You Tube gave better instructions than the enclosed micro type booklet. I am notoriously hard on watches... We'll what a few weeks in the field do to it. Stay tuned
customer_reviews.author: Gary Guilmette

customer_reviews.title: Durable.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift. I own the same one. I love it. This watch is one tough time piece. I've personally sprayed paint drywall plaster, dirt, mud, & saltwater all over this watch. It cleans up like new Everytime. It has a larger bezel which is fantastic. Most people prefer I find. It's not the XL version which is larger and bulky. Just a great watch with a great fit. Its a GShock.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Suspicious about authenticity
customer_reviews.text: Worried it might be fake... I bought this to replace the same model watch that I purchased In store years ago. Noticeable differences in the back faceplate, and other more subtle differences from the original.
customer_reviews.author: IG Mattampafl

customer_reviews.title: Great watch!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this watch for my boyfriend as a Christmas gift. We are both very pleased! The watch is durable and looks sharp. He will be able to easily wear this watch for any occasion. I read reviews where people mentioned the display is hard to see, but we did not find this to be an issue. The display is clear and easy to read. The watch is the perfect size, bf claims is comfortable to wear, and is of good quality. Overall, I would recommend this watch to anyone! You won't be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Good enough for Law Enforcement
customer_reviews.text: I wear this watch for work everyday and no complaints. I know some people complain about not being able to see the display but I don’t have any issues. Solid watch
customer_reviews.author: A. Sev

customer_reviews.title: Best watch
customer_reviews.text: The best product for this money. Use every day. They are very strong and hold moisture well. I dived into them in the ocean. I don't take them off when I take a shower. I used to tear my watch for work, but it kept scratching, and this watch is just perfect for work
customer_reviews.author: Igor D

customer_reviews.title: Great wacht!
customer_reviews.text: It is a great Clock. perhaps the built-in light is not very "bright" but it does the job it is supposed to do. I am happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Fabricio Teran

customer_reviews.title: Not just for men!
customer_reviews.text: I was worried this would be too big, but it’s really not. Don’t get me wrong, it’s a larger watch, but it doesn’t look ridiculous on a woman’s wrist. I hadn’t worn a watch for years, but have no problem wearing this everyday. Super comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: LadyPatriot76

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my boyfriend as a graduation gift in 2017. It JUST broke, and that’s only because he picked at the slack loop (past the clasp) and broke it himself. Still functions though! This thing went through Army basic training in 2017 and the daily life of a farmer until this year.
customer_reviews.author: McKinley Flinders

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and broken
customer_reviews.text: Bought and returned this watch. Though it looks like many other G-Shock watches I have bought before the rubber was cheap and the worse part it was opened on Christmas broken. I have owned many G-Shocks before and loved them for many years. This is not worth the money like it’s counter parts.
customer_reviews.author: Jason B. Neumann

customer_reviews.title: The GA100's are winners
customer_reviews.text: Let me first say that I am a G-Shock fan and I own a bunch of the. The GA100 series are some go my favorites and this blacked out version was a must have for me.Great prices on this series and all the basic functions you will need for day to day use. Of course the durability goes without say.
customer_reviews.author: Private

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to read the face.  Does not look like the photo.
customer_reviews.text: Watch is comfortable a looks good but very difficult to read digital display. I has to be in just the right light to read. Display is not anywhere near as clear as the photo. The sub dials are almost impossible to read. The analog display is the only thing at 3 stars. It is very legible and easy to see even when using the terrible light.
customer_reviews.author: Abraham Remchuk

customer_reviews.title: Low visibility digital output
customer_reviews.text: I'm satisfied with this watch for it's durabiltiy, toughness. I wear it at work on construction and confident it'll take a beating. The only reason for the 3 stars is for how low the visibility the digital areas are, if the hands aren't in the way, you need to tilt the watch at certain angles to view it correctly, and that's if it's daytime. The light doesn't light up for the digital part. I would like to return it for one without the digital but It's been worn. I wanted the stopwatch/lap for running.
customer_reviews.author: Gerry Richard

customer_reviews.title: Can’t See
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son to wear in bootcamp and after. He decided to buy a watch from the NEX because even when this one is illuminated, you can’t see the time or anything. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie W

customer_reviews.title: Very durable, reliable and stylish.
customer_reviews.text: Got this watch 8 years ago and it finally died out. Instead of installing new batteries, I decided to buy a new one. I have a couple of these in different colors. Great watch! I highly recommend this to anyone who is thinking about getting a new watch.
customer_reviews.author: rubenrod22

customer_reviews.title: Extremely durable
customer_reviews.text: Best watch on the market. I had one for 5 years and the only thing that happened is the band broke. You can get new bands but I figured I already had it 5 years so why not just buy the same one again!
customer_reviews.author: Jake

customer_reviews.title: Please look elsewhere for a good, G Shock.
customer_reviews.text: I'm a longtime Prime member that buys often, but rarely writes reviews. In this case, though this watch deserves one. It is bulky, uncomfortable and even in broad daylight you can barely see anything but the hands. Other than broad daylight, you will only see the hands, even with the led light. This is a HUGE disappointment from Casio G-Shock. I can't understand why it has so many positive reviews aside from people trying to justify buyers remorse after the return period.
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: My husband LOVES!
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves these watches! This is actually his third one and loves it’s features. He’s got different faces for different days😂. He’s still waiting on a bigger face, FYI! 😂
customer_reviews.author: Jassydai

customer_reviews.title: Your eyesight better be PERFECT!
customer_reviews.text: I can barely read everything but the digital display. The light isn't really bright enough to make any difference especially at night! You can tell the time ok but all the other features are very hard to see.. I would like the watch if I could read the display! Too bad. Looks cool though.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn

customer_reviews.title: Rounds out my collection
customer_reviews.text: I've had several digital sport watches but it's been years since I've had a G-Shock. Took me some time (get it?) to figure out the settings but the best thing about it is the look. Just a real cool looking watch
customer_reviews.author: Robusto

customer_reviews.title: Cheap stuff
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed in watch. Replacing battery is a pain; reveals how cheap this watch is.
customer_reviews.author: Chicolini

customer_reviews.title: Very difficult to see read display
customer_reviews.text: While this watch looks pretty cool. I though I would like the all black design. However, when I opened it up and attempted to set the data.., I found it very diffcult to read the informaion on the various modes. I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: I felt sad when the light did not work
customer_reviews.text: I was excited when the package finally came to my hands. I felt sad when the light did not work. But I thought that was not a problem since the time worked fine ... but when the alarm started to fail I was already disappointed ...
customer_reviews.author: Kevin geovanny ordoñez andino

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: This was delivered very nicely with a metal box which you can keep with it however instructions on how to set times or anything on it were not clear.
customer_reviews.author: Traci Jiles

customer_reviews.title: My husband loved the look of the watch and all it’s functions ...
customer_reviews.text: My husband loved the look of the watch and all it’s functions however, come night time, it’s not very functional. You can’t see a lot of the features. I don’t understand why the back doesn’t light up.
customer_reviews.author: Sky

customer_reviews.title: Arrived and the box was USED!
customer_reviews.text: Box was all beat up and appeared to be used. Corners bashed in, opening re-taped, and another bar code sticker was placed over existing one on box. Advertised as NEW... sure did not look that way. Tried on the watch... back light very weak and digital displays difficulty to read. Would like to add pics, but it will not allow me. Returning.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The light for date and day does not work.
customer_reviews.text: This Casio does not work as advertised. You are wasting your money on it. I have tried to return it and Amazon has failed me in its promise to be able to do so.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Broyles

customer_reviews.title: A little Too stealthy..
customer_reviews.text: The watch looks really cool and stealthy but it was really hard to see the time. No numbers and the markers are so dark that if you're not in bright sunlight you will sit there wondering if it's 10 after 4 or 5? To set the watch was a real big pain. I gave up and had my Physics Professor do it for me.
customer_reviews.author: zeebop9

customer_reviews.title: Great watch but awful illumination light...
customer_reviews.text: Great look at feel but awful illumination! When lit in the dark, you cannot read the digital readings, only see the hands to tell time. But for $70, i will keep. C'mon Casio, step it up with at least an Indigo light....
customer_reviews.author: SKH

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I only sent it back because it was too dark for me to view... Otherwise it was a solid watch.. I quickly ordered a different Casio watch.. There is one for everyone I assure you.
customer_reviews.author: Troy

customer_reviews.title: Seems like a good watch.
customer_reviews.text: My son bought this and likes it a lot. Says he would buy it again. But he has only oriented it for a few days. We will update this review if anything changes.
customer_reviews.author: Bostrom Mom

customer_reviews.title: Once you go black...
customer_reviews.text: Once you order your first "tactical" or "subdued" watch in BLACK or EARTH TONES you will not want to wear anything else. This watch has more features than i need, but is great all around. The entire watch is black, with the exception of the clasp (stainless) and the clock arms (white). I suppose the white arms would have been better if they were gray or stainless, but all in all GREAT BUY!! It will suffice until you buy that Luminox, besides at a third of the price, you won’t cry when you bang it up a bit.
customer_reviews.author: Key_Yak_J

customer_reviews.title: Nice Watch
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a blacked out watch so I chose this watch. I also wanted a lite weight watch that I can exercise in. Overall, the watch is great because it met most of my requirements. It is a little hard to see the digital display in low light and the light that is in the watch only helps to illuminate the hands on the watch. The one thing I didn't get was size. I really thought the watch would be bigger. It is probably big enough for most people but I like my watches to fit a little bigger. Again, overall the watch is great.
customer_reviews.author: R Nance

customer_reviews.title: Great product definitely buy it again
customer_reviews.text: I buy bought this watch about 4 times first when I went over seas and it's was stolen off base and the second time it was damaged in a fire 3rd time it was lost but never have I once had any issues with this watch amazing product
customer_reviews.author: josh

customer_reviews.title: Happy with this watch.
customer_reviews.text: This is a really nice watch. What others say/complain about the digital displays not being visible, yes, in the dark you will NOT SEE A THING digital readout wise even if you use the watch light, but, this is supposed to be a stealth watch and I'm cool with that.
customer_reviews.author: Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Military grade timepiece
customer_reviews.text: I love the chonkin’ big face, shock resistance and near-waterproof case. The LED light is great for preserving night vision in the dark. I think the most complex function of this watch is the stopwatch and lap split time, which I don’t see myself using. That’s a shame because there’s a whole dial devoted to that which will go unused. Ah, well. The timer and 5 alarms are easy to set, at least.
customer_reviews.author: J. W. Haas

customer_reviews.title: Very durable!
customer_reviews.text: 2 years and going strong! My husband is a firefighter and is not exactly gentle with his watch, but it’s clearly durable as it has lasted this long and still looks and works great. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey Soares

customer_reviews.title: Bad Contrast on LCD
customer_reviews.text: I started out thinking that this was a really nice looking watch. Until I started trying to actually read the LCD screens. I missed other reviews complaining of this but you have to have just the right angle in order to read them and in the dark, the illumination is useless. I did find an interesting blurb in the manual about different models having different contrasts but I think I got the third model with dark background and dark figures. Returned and purchased a different watch.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Cunningham

customer_reviews.title: I love the look of this watch
customer_reviews.text: I love the look of this watch. I got it for running and so far so good. My eye sight is not great so the LCD is not good for me unless it is sunny outside or I am looking at it under bright light. However, this is why I got this watch because of the analog time display, which is great.
customer_reviews.author: Curtis Wee

customer_reviews.title: My second G Shock still have old one. Great watches.
customer_reviews.text: Only thing I don’t like is the stop watch hands should have been the second hand that moves all the time,
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good easily doable directions.
customer_reviews.text: Horrible directions to set watch and local jeweler could not adjust watch. I only have use of one arm and this watch was a disaster. Had many g shock watches in past but this one was a waste. Sorry, but a watch needs to be more user friendly.
customer_reviews.author: Michael T.

customer_reviews.title: Great watch for the price!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great watch bought it for work so I don’t ruin my nice watch anymore. So far so good absolutely love it
customer_reviews.author: Mike Benson

product_meta.title: Casio Men's GA100 XL Ana-Digi G-Shock Watch
product_meta.description: Born from a dream of "creating a watch that never breaks." It was over 30 years ago, a CASIO engineer won the battle against the laws of nature. He designed a watch that would resist centrifugal and impact forces, as well as high water pressure. Since then, the name G-SHOCK has become a byword for independence and pushing the limits. G-SHOCK watches are the most durable digital and analog-digital watches in the industry, trusted by military personnel, law enforcement, surfers and outdoor enthusiasts around the world. Along with this, G-SHOCK is highly touted in the fashion world, worn by icons in hip-hop, sports, and design. With limited edition collaborations being released often, you can always find a G-SHOCK that matches your personality and style.

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
